name: Nuwa's Revenge
description:
A little game that was made for Untitled Game Jam #29 in August, 2020. The theme of this jam was TRANSFORMATION.

Nuwa is a goddess that awakens in another plan. In combat every turn your element and stats will change following the mutation flow.

CONTROLS:

[W, A, S, D] or the Directional Arrows ---> MOVE
[J, E or Enter] ---> INTERACT
[K, Ctrl or Space] ---> RUN WITH JADE BOOTS
[L or R] ---> RECHARGE
[I or Esc] ---> PAUSE/RESUME

Hope everyone can enjoy this game!
Thanks for playing!

Update Patch 1.0.1 ---> Save/Load error fixed.
